text: The Scarlet Honeymoon is a 1925 American silent drama film directed by Alan Hale and starring Shirley Mason, Pierre Gendron and Allan Sears.Kennedy p.303 ==Cast== * Shirley Mason as Kay Thorpe * Pierre Gendron as Pedro Fernando * Allan Sears as Harrison * J. Farrell MacDonald as Joshua Thorpe * Rose Tapley as Mamie Thorpe * Bud Geary as Elmer Thorpe * Eugenia Gilbert as Stella Thorpe * Eric Mayne as Señor Fernando * Eulalie Jensen as Señora Gernando ==References== ==Bibliography== * Matthew Kennedy. Edmund Goulding's Dark Victory: Hollywood's Genius Bad Boy. Terrace Books, 2004. ==External links== * Category:1925 films Category:1925 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by Alan Hale Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Fox Film films Category:American black-and-white films
title: The Scarlet Honeymoon
